climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🌙Fluffy & Soft Mattress Pad🌙: Queen Mattress Pad (60''x80'') with microfiber top layer and the new designed microfiber filling (50% 3D+50% 6D) provide softness and extra resilience, that giving you cozy feel and most relaxing sleep.

🌙Cooling Breathable Mattress Pad🌙: The microfiber top makes the surface feel cooling and breathable, the microfiber filling (50% 3D+50% 6D) increases circulation and breathability. It will provide you a cozy and breathable sleeping environment, make you feel comfortable without extra heat and sweat.

🌙Quilted Fitted Mattress Pad🌙: Compared to the normal diamond quilting seam, this quilted fitted pad with new shape is more supportive, soft and durability. Rebound well after washing, quick drying and wrinkle resistant features help save your time and your electric bill.

🌙Mattress Pad with Deep Pocket🌙: The 360° fabric pocket sides can be easily stretched to fit mattresses up to 8" -21" thick. It will hold tight on all mattress types, whether it's a regular mattress, a waterbed, or memory. It will never slide no matter how you twist and turn in your bed.
🌙 Machine Washable Mattress Pad🌙: Machine washable, under gentle cycle with cold water, tumble dry low. Please DO NOT iron, DO NOT dry clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why people love MATBEBY Mattress Pad? The MATBEBY mattress pad is a fluffy Soft healthier Mattress topper, It provides you with a heavenly sleeping experience. The mattress pad can be easily matched to your existing bed , They have the following advantages: Ultra Soft and ComfortableSkin FriendlyCooling and BreathableDeep Pockets hold the Mattress TightlyMachine Washable

Soft & Comfortable This mattress pad is made of quality microfiber top layer and microfiber filling , It provides softness and comfort, fluffy and it have extra cushioning, that will upgrade your quality of sleep. Breathable This mattress pad is breathable. The quality microfiber top makes the surface feel cooling and breathable, it will wick away any moisture or sweat, provide you a cozy and breathable sleeping environment. Deep Pocket This mattress pad can be easily matched to your existing bed, and the Deep Pocket can easily grips any mattress up to 21" , which is reliable enough to free your hand and relax your mind. Machine Washable This Mattress Protector is Machine Washable and Durable, under gentle cycle with cold water, tumble dry low. Please DO NOT iron, DO NOT dry clean.

MATBEBY mattress topper safeguards your bed with ZERO staining and NO discoloration as if having a new mattress. Easy to put on and take off for laundry, you won’t need to wrestle your heavy mattress any more. Machine washable mattress cover will keep your sleep environment clean and hassle-free. Feel the difference HERE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: How pleased I am to receive such a nice product at a reasonable price! The box for this product felt surprisingly heavy, for just a mattress pad. I opened the Amazon box to discover the pad was boxed within a manufacturer box. When I opened that, I found the mattress pad was vacuum wrapped in plastic - sealed in airtight. When I cut the seal open, the mattress pad immediately puffed up! It still felt dense and weighty. Once fully opened, the mattress pad was soft and nicely fluffy. Though not as thick as manufacturer photos might suggest (although to be honest it might actually look like that if it went from factory straight to a bed), it had surprising loft to it. The pad went on the bed easily and was a nice fit - pretty exact with no excess “hang over”. I initially thought, when I ordered it that it might be too deep for my 12” memory foam mattress but it wasn’t. The side depth allowed me to tuck it in well and smoothly. It looked and felt nice on the bed, even once the sheet was on.I normally would have felt I needed to wash this before use but the way it was vacuum sealed made me feel comfortable putting it right on the bed.Seldom do products like this measure up to the photos but in this case I was happily surprised. I’m very pleased with the product, would recommend it, and will be happy my visiting son will enjoy a nice bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mattress pad is lovely for a soft, comfy bed cover. I love it! It’s well made and fits perfectly. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits absolutely perfect on a full sized bed, soft, and comfy but not as fluffy as expected, still of great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for something that is really thick this is not it. But for me that is not a bad thing. I did not want anything really thick. I needed a little padding as my extra firm mattress has changed for me. I needed extra firm due to my back probs. But now that my back is better the firmness is a bit much, so I needed something with a little thickness and this was it, it is prefect. When I opened it I threw it in the dry for about 10 minutes and it fluffed up nicely. I would not put it on the bed without doing this as you may not get the full effect of the topper. It needs to be fluffed up in the dryer.All in all I really like this, it works perfect for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to help air mattresses!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these with the purpose of using them while camping, in our camper and when we tent camped and use air mattresses. I wanted just a little extra comfort and these did the job greatly! They have been easy to clean and give extra comfort. They are not as thick as a mattress topper would end but they are better than a regular mattress pad. Good for the price you are paying. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy and soft, fits well, new life for old mattress
reviews.reviewText: We have an older pillow top mattress but this adds a new cushion. Fits well and easy to put on, roomy enough for a high profile matress. I washed it prior to putting it on and it washed and dried well in regular settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Barely good, not great. Barely soft, not “so soft” or “ultra soft”
reviews.reviewText: If you’ve never had an experience with a mattress topper, this is my second experience. I bought this under the intention of replacing my current mattress topper that is truly, SUPER SOFT, and filled my intention of having a plush, super soft mattress topper. My current “topper”, no longer - I said bye-bye to it - was all I had hoped since I have a firm mattress, and no plush top. The brand I had is no longer made.Age and washing my current mattress topper is why I am looking for a new topper. The mattress topper was super heavy and barely made it to my washing machine and should’ve gone to a commercial washer but I loved it and I had a few years and it was truly, plush, thick and super soft!!!I will keep this Mateby version. I am adding other layers on top of this Mateby topper to further protect the mattress topper and mattress and add “soft & plush “ levels. Hence, I am OK with keeping this, but it is good, barely 2.5 stars, I am generous and gave it 3 stars.I was looking for a soft mattress topper, but not as thick as what I had on my bed, which was a good 3 inches of soft, fluffy, thick filling. This mattress topper you’re looking at is not thick, barely soft, nor super fluffy. I would say it’s barely 1 inch thick, if that, and loosely filled. How can you tell this just looking at the information THEY, the manufacturer, provide?Do your homework. Look at the weight of the product and the GSM of a product, what is GSM? Grams/square meter. GSM will tell you how thick a product is, how heavy a product is, how durable a product is, how thick it is or verify what the manufacturer says it is. The GSM on this product is pretty low and indicates to me it is not thick or push. My goal was to have a soft, not super plush/heavy topper that is easier to handle and wash in a home washing machine, and add other protective layers on top of the topper to help with the softness and protection. Do not trust that this will protect your mattress. Don’t read everything that the manufacture tells you. They list in the title “protector” it does not protect. Look at the info below:“Water resistance level”: Not water resistant. “Special Feature:” Durability, ResistantResistant to what? Stupid people?I’m adding another layer of protection over this for cooling and breathability and protects everything underneath it including my mattress. This “topper” is not a mattress protector. I don’t feel it is, I read it isn’t, and now know it more so, owning this product.It serves, my purpose, could be a little bit more plush and fluffy, is 4.8 lbs so I knew it was easy to handle and wasn’t as thick. You can see that in the information, but, their “new version” is over 10 pounds, which tells me it’s most likely thicker and plush. It screams it from the info they provided and it’s on sale. Go get the new version if you are looking for a thick, plush, soft, and that it meets OKEO standards.The bottom line, this product is barely soft and plush. If you’re looking for soft and plush, this product is not for you. If you’re looking for cotton, this product is not for you. I love cotton, this product is OK at best. I prefer cotton. This version/brand is a topper and barely serves its purpose the manufacturer is telling you “believe us.” Definitely not a mattress protector, nor should you expect it to help your back problems.DO. YOUR. HOMEWORK. Everyone has different needs. Look at the info they provide, the best and worst reviews and go with what’s best for your goals. You might have to invest more money, but in the end it’ll be worth it for you. People saying this is super plush and soft; not even close!!!You owe it to yourself to invest your time, research, since most of these manufacturers have contradictions and lies in their copy. This one does. Some of the reviews are horrifying - pray that is not you, scary. Good luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I need a new mattress but could not afford one so I saw this and thought I would give this a try. Very nice and thick. Washed up nice great fit on my bed. Now I feel I can wait a few months before I get a new mattress.
Fits perfectly with the king configurations and covers all corners

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mattress protector for odd size mattress in Australia
reviews.reviewText: The Mattress Protector is as described, well made and Quality item. Great size for odd size mattress in Jayco campers, thank you
Finally a mattress cover that is breathable. I was skeptical, as most manufacturers make this claim…and it’s not the case.
